channel.title: Message doesnt end?
channel.description: I have encountered a problem once again. i am using a delta source. So i have a message. Its like the message that covers ur message bar thingy and it tells you to "click here to continue" well when it gets to the last message and i click the continue button and it stays on the screen and says "please wait..." and it doesnt go away until i walk from the spot where i was. Any help??

item.title: Message doesnt end?
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:6, topic:401832”][quote author=jaruanna link=topic=498890.msg3648345#msg3648345 date=1309547648]

I’d say after they click the last one, set the chatbox interface to -1 (i think that resets it to normal.)

do u know the interface number?

-1 should work.

so put “showInterface(-1);”
[/quote]

No. I believe there is a method called setChatboxInterface. That’s what you need to set the interface to.[/quote]

Well its not in client.java, player.java, clickingmost.java or npc.java. I tried closeInterface(); didnt work

EDIT: Well i put // in front of the other cases that are supposed to go with the method but it said those lines that i did not want to person to say. How do i make it so it doesnt say that?

Read full topic

item.title: Message doesnt end?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“jaruanna, post:5, topic:401832”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=498890.msg3648336#msg3648336 date=1309547440]

I’d say after they click the last one, set the chatbox interface to -1 (i think that resets it to normal.)

do u know the interface number?

-1 should work.
[/quote]

so put “showInterface(-1);”[/quote]

No. I believe there is a method called setChatboxInterface. That’s what you need to set the interface to.

Read full topic
